answers.answer: Lol i do the same!!Its not horrible to eat junk food or like your baby will come out sick or unhealthy...just try to add some fruits and veggies when you can! Thats what i do and baby is very strong and healthy
Im the exact same! I love junk food but i do eat some fruit and veg. X
So its not horrible to be eating it all the time ?
Not really just make sure you exercise good and stay hydrated...just because you eat junk food doesnt mean your gonna be unhealthy!

I crave lots of bad stuff too, but i don't eat it. I did that with my first pregnancy and constantly had high blood pressure, head aches, tummy aches, swelling, and gained 33 pounds. With this second baby i still crave the chocolate, fast food, etc..but I'm just too afraid to touch it. It's working so far. I'm 22 weeks and only gained 3 pounds. But as long as your drinking juice, plenty of water, doing some light exercise, and taking your prenatals then i think you'll be fine. Just don't over do it, as fun as it is lol
Nothing will happen to the baby, you on the other hand might gain excess weight, but if that don't bother you then eat on :)
It can give the baby ingestational diabetes, but idk the chances I would just keep exercising and eat some fruits and veggies

question: Is it really bad to be eating too much junk food ? Like chips candy fast food ? Cause that's what I crave the most I eat fruit sometimes but not like I should I can't help it if I'm not craving it I'm not eating it
title: junk foood !!! YUM
